Become a mage!
Do you wish to become a mage with magical powers or continue your mundane life as a normal mortal. Choose wisely!
Yes, I want magic flowing through my blood!
Leave me be, I don't believe in magic!
Become Air Mage
Do you wish to learn the secrets of the air element?
Yes! I will master the element of air!
Become Earth Mage
Do you wish to learn the secrets of the earth element?
Yes! I will master the element of earth!
Become Fire Mage
Do you wish to learn the secrets of the fire element?
Yes! I will master the element of fire!
Become Water Mage
Do you wish to learn the secrets of the water element?
Yes! I will master the element of water!
Time to go on a quest!
Great riches and magical knowledge await me!
You see an inn close by
You've been on your journey for a few days and see an inn close by.
Meet some fellow adventurers
While at the inn you meet a warrior and a rouge who offer to join you on your quest.
Sure! We'll be safer if we work together!
I don't need help!
Attacked by bandits!
You and your companions are attacked by bandits! You all work together to counter their ambush!
We fought well!
This is dangerous and I need to head back home!
Attacked by bandits!
You are attacked by bandits! You quickly put up a magical defense to counter their attack!
I fought well!
This is dangerous and I need to head back home!
